result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerome Jemal Cook

defendant.name: Cook, Jerome Jemal
defendant.address: 2322 North Oakland Avenue, Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53211

records.addlTxt: Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

DUE TO TECHNICAL ISSUES, THIS HEARING WAS HELD OFF THE RECORD. THIS IS NOT THE OFFICIAL RECORD. Defendant Jerome Jemal Cook appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Margo Elise Clark appeared by video for Jerome Jemal Cook. Attorney Mallory R Davis appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. Forwarded to Judge for review.

Defendant Jerome Jemal Cook not in court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz appeared by video for Jerome Jemal Cook.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for pre-trial conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Pre-trial conference on September 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

10:09 AM Defendant Jerome Jemal Cook in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Jerome Jemal Cook in custody.  Arthur Kenneth Thexton appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jerome Jemal Cook appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Jerome Jemal Cook not in court.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/27/2022@2pm
